name: Bloody Moon
description:
This is a single-player third-person shooter about the zombie virus outbreak in the future world, as the last survivor and the last resistance of the zombies!

Introduction to the gameplay
Pure zombie fighting game where equipment can be found in every corner of the map
Weapons have limited ammunition and cannot waste every round
Material points are refreshed every once in a while

There will be leaderboards in the game to compete with your friends for the first place!
